it.polimi.se2018.controller

Class ToolController

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.controller.ToolController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Action

    public class ToolController
extends java.lang.Object
implements Action
    ToolCards are divided into states and operations. A state is what ToolCard needs between two user interaction divided by Server request. An operation is the minimum ToolCard's action. This ToolCard manager sets operation and manages the interaction between them.
